name: 鱿鱼 Game - 123 Stop (Source Code)
description:
Source code and tutorials:

A  Html5 Webgl game built with Laya Air game engine.

Game is well optimized and can be loaded instantly and even run smoothly on low-end device browsers.

Source code can be used to released on Facebook Instant Game or any web game portal.

Attached images for pseudocode of core functionalities.

Game Introductions:

An amazing shooting game based on Red Light, Green Light that we used to play when we were kids.

Begin your survival adventure as the player with red hair.

Become the last survivor impostor and get money in this challenging game.

Do not waste your time, and get started your deadly challenge right away!

Play Squid Game 456 player challenge, or other people call it red light green light.

Stop at the red light & Continue when the green light is on

Remember that the big doll is watching you, so be careful and stop once she turns her head.

Reach the final line before time's up.
